Package com.algonquincollege.cst8284_section310.simulation

Class SpaceExplorationSimulator

java.lang.Object
com.algonquincollege.cst8284_section310.simulation.SpaceExplorationSimulator
public class SpaceExplorationSimulator
extends java.lang.Object
class for the Space game, including game rules, menu function, methods of the class
Since:
Feb 11, 2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
mikew

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static Actor[][] actors
    create a 2D array, which is the play area, row and colunm are the coordinate for the spaceship or asteroid in the game, the accessible field is private, means that it can not be changed outside
    private boolean barFlag
    create a boolean attribute to determine if the user wants to draw the bars in the game; default value is false, when user wants bars, the boolean value will switch to true
    private int DOWN
    declare constant varibles for the moveActors() method when get 0 from Math.random() in the moveActors(), it means the ship goes up; 1 for going right; 2 for going down
    private java.util.Scanner input
    create the attribute to get the value from the scanner (user input) every round in the process
    private static int MAX_COLUMNS
    set the constant value of rows of the play area, it can not be changed outside
    private static int MAX_ROWS
    set the constant value of rows of the play area, it can not be changed outside
    private int MAX_SHIPS
    set the max value of the ship, it's a final constant, too
    private int RIGHT
    declare constant varibles for the moveActors() method when get 0 from Math.random() in the moveActors(), it means the ship goes up; 1 for going right; 2 for going down
    private int shipsDestroyed
    create the counter of destroyed ships, starts from 0, and accumulated in the prcess
    private int shipsEscaped
    create the counter of escaped ships, starts from 0, and accumulated in the prcess
    private int turnCount
    create the counter of turn, the variable will be used in the loop of process
    private int UP
    declare constant varibles for the moveActors() method when get 0 from Math.random() in the moveActors(), it means the ship goes up; 1 for going right; 2 for going down

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    SpaceExplorationSimulator()
    non-parameter constructor to create object for SpaceExplorationSimulator class call constructor: SpaceExplorationSimulator(int shipsDestroyed, int shipsEscaped, int turnCount,Actor[][] actors, boolean barFlag) set the default values as: shipsDestroyed =0, shipsEscaped=0, turnCount=0, actors= new Actor[MAX_ROWS][MAX_COLUMNS], barFlag=false;
    SpaceExplorationSimulator​(int shipsDestroyed, int shipsEscaped, int turnCount, Actor[][] actors, boolean barFlag)
    constructor to create new object for SpaceExplorationSimulator chained to non-parameterd constructor

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void addAsteroid()
    when the method being called, there are 10% chance to add an asteroid into the play ground accessiable field is private, so that it can't be changed outside the class 1, use Math.random()*(101-1+1)+1 to get a random value from 1-101, compare with the constant value CHANCE (which is 10), only when the random value is less than 10, there will be one more new asteroid added into the area 2, use Math.random()*(4-0+1)+0, to get a random value from 0-4, which decide the row coordinate for the new added asteroid, and put it into the far right column in the area; 3, if the Actor[new row][new column] where the new asteroid will be added is null, add the asteroid; if there's a spaceship, then remove ship and asteroid, and make the destroyed ship counter++; if there's another asteroid, then remove both (set as null)
    private void drawSpaceSimulation()
    draw the grid for the simulation using nested loops.
    private void initializeArray()
    initialize the start layout of the game, 5 ships at the very left in each row, and call addAsteroid() to add asteroid accessiable field is private, so that it can't be changed outside the class
    private boolean isEndOfSimulation()
    if shipsDestroyed + shipsEscapged >= Max_ships, game over accessiable field is private, so that it can't be changed outside the class
    private boolean isMoveOffBoard​(int newRow, int newCol)
    to check if the ship/asteroid would be outside the 2D array, accessiable field is private, so that it can't be changed outside the class
    private void move​(int row, int col, int newRow, int newCol, char thing)
    move() function for both ship and asteroid, accessiable field is private, so that it can't be changed outside the class
    private void moveActors()
    loop over the 2-D array and move each actor, depending on the icon, S for ship, A for asteroid.
    private void prepareActorsForMovement()
    This methods loops over the 2D array and re-activates all of the actors so that when the moveActors() methods loops over the array each actor will be moved at least once.
    void runSimulation()
    run the simulation asking the user to continue for each turn, or until the end of the simulation is detected.
    void setBarFlag​(boolean bool)
    set the value of barFlag

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • SpaceExplorationSimulator

      public SpaceExplorationSimulator()
      non-parameter constructor to create object for SpaceExplorationSimulator class call constructor: SpaceExplorationSimulator(int shipsDestroyed, int shipsEscaped, int turnCount,Actor[][] actors, boolean barFlag) set the default values as: shipsDestroyed =0, shipsEscaped=0, turnCount=0, actors= new Actor[MAX_ROWS][MAX_COLUMNS], barFlag=false;

    • SpaceExplorationSimulator

      public SpaceExplorationSimulator​(int shipsDestroyed, int shipsEscaped, int turnCount, Actor[][] actors, boolean barFlag)
      constructor to create new object for SpaceExplorationSimulator chained to non-parameterd constructor
      Parameters:
      shipsDestroyed - : destroyed ships counter, once ship crashes, counter++
      shipsEscaped - : escaped ships counter, once ship escapes, counter++
      turnCount - : turn counter, when loop over 2D array, counter++
      actors - : 2D array, icon including "S" for ship, "A" for asteroid, and ""
      barFlag - : flag to determine if the user wants the "|" shows up

  • Method Details

    • runSimulation

      public void runSimulation()
      run the simulation asking the user to continue for each turn, or until the end of the simulation is detected. add a new asteroid using the addAsteroid() method every 10 turns. Senior Programmer: This method was verified, do not change it or we will fire you.

    • initializeArray

      private void initializeArray()
      initialize the start layout of the game, 5 ships at the very left in each row, and call addAsteroid() to add asteroid accessiable field is private, so that it can't be changed outside the class

    • addAsteroid

      private void addAsteroid()
      when the method being called, there are 10% chance to add an asteroid into the play ground accessiable field is private, so that it can't be changed outside the class 1, use Math.random()*(101-1+1)+1 to get a random value from 1-101, compare with the constant value CHANCE (which is 10), only when the random value is less than 10, there will be one more new asteroid added into the area 2, use Math.random()*(4-0+1)+0, to get a random value from 0-4, which decide the row coordinate for the new added asteroid, and put it into the far right column in the area; 3, if the Actor[new row][new column] where the new asteroid will be added is null, add the asteroid; if there's a spaceship, then remove ship and asteroid, and make the destroyed ship counter++; if there's another asteroid, then remove both (set as null)

    • moveActors

      private void moveActors()
      loop over the 2-D array and move each actor, depending on the icon, S for ship, A for asteroid. accessiable field is private, so that it can't be changed outside the class situation1: if the Actor is a ship, and isMoved()value is false, then switch isMoved() value to true, means it has been moved this turn use Math.random()*(2-0+1)+0 to get a random value from 0-2, and move if random value is 0, go up. call move(), set newRow as (row-1); 1, go right, call move(), set newColumn value as (column+1); 2, go down, call move(), set newRow value as (row+1); situation2: if it's an asteroid, then move left, call move(), set newCoumnvalue as (column-1) the rules when a spaceship/asteroid meet another S/A is included in move()

    • move

      private void move​(int row, int col, int newRow, int newCol, char thing)
      move() function for both ship and asteroid, accessiable field is private, so that it can't be changed outside the class
      Parameters:
      row - current row index of the ship
      col - current column index of the ship
      newRow - the new row index where the ship will go to
      newCol - the new column index where the ship is going to
      thing - the current cell's icon , identify it's ship or asteroid rule description: - Ship to Asteroid: Ship is destroyed, destroyedShip counter++; - Ship to Ship: The ship skips it's turn and does not move. - Asteroid to Ship: Ship is removed, asteroid moves. - Asteroid to Asteroid: Both asteroids are removed. - Ships are not allowed to leave the top or bottom of the play area - Ships to move past the very-right column are escaped, escapedShip counter++; logic description: situation 1: when the "thing"(ship/asteroid) is in the board 1.1 : there are no obstacles in 4 directions, just go 1.2: there's some obstacle 1.21: the "thing" is a space ship 1.211: meets the asteroid, remove ship 1.212: meets another ship,or at top or bottom, no move 1.22: the "thing" is an asteroid 1.221: asteroid meets a space ship, remove ship 1.222: meets another asteroid, remove both situation 2: When ship/asteroid is going out of the board 2.1: it's a ship, and is going rightward, escape successfully 2.2: it's an asteroid, just both vanish

    • drawSpaceSimulation

      private void drawSpaceSimulation()
      draw the grid for the simulation using nested loops. default bar will be ""; if user wants to show the bar (the barFlag value is true), then bar will switch to "|" author name is on screen for each loop. accessiable field is private, so that it can't be changed outside the class

    • isEndOfSimulation

      private boolean isEndOfSimulation()
      if shipsDestroyed + shipsEscapged >= Max_ships, game over accessiable field is private, so that it can't be changed outside the class
      Returns:
      true, means the game is end; false means game continues

    • isMoveOffBoard

      private boolean isMoveOffBoard​(int newRow, int newCol)
      to check if the ship/asteroid would be outside the 2D array, accessiable field is private, so that it can't be changed outside the class
      Parameters:
      newRow - , the new row index for ship/asteroid after moving
      newCol - , the new column index for ship/asteroid after moving
      Returns:
      true, means would go out of the 2D array; false, means would be stay in the array

    • prepareActorsForMovement

      private void prepareActorsForMovement()
      This methods loops over the 2D array and re-activates all of the actors so that when the moveActors() methods loops over the array each actor will be moved at least once. accessiable field is private, so that it can't be changed outside the class

    • setBarFlag

      public void setBarFlag​(boolean bool)
      set the value of barFlag
      Parameters:
      bool - , if true, means the user wants to show the bar for play area
